QuestData.Title: The Stone Throne
QuestData.Description: I am returning to my throne. I've no desire to see any more of these Earthen Ring, but you remain welcome here, $r. If you wish to help us rebuild our realm, perhaps we can help you in return.$B$BAll things in time.
QuestData.LogDescription: Seek out Therazane at Therazane's Throne.
QuestData.RewardText: You returned. This is good. The Stone Lords have been asking after you.
